intro: Agathosma alligans, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It has aromatic leaves that are often used in traditional medicine. Agathosma alligans is also valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens.
